<title level="1" right="Spell 4" pfs="Standard">[Detect Scrying](/Spells.aspx?ID=68)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Detection" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=43" />
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 328 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Area** 30-foot emanation

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 hour
</row>

</column>

---

By tapping into trace divinatory auras, you detect the presence of [scrying](/Traits.aspx?ID=141) effects in the area. If _detect scrying_ is higher level than a scrying effect, you gain a glimpse of the scrying creature and learn its approximate distance and direction.

---
**Heightened (6th)** The duration is until the next time you make your daily preparations.
name: Detect Scrying
